StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.label: fine herringbone parquet
StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.description: Beautifully laid down wooden flooring for that posh, fancy feeling.

StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.label: versailles parquet
StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.description: Beautiful wooden parquet, made with no compromises, for expressing economic status. Slow to construct.

StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.label: cobblestone floor
StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.description: Random-size stone tiles for a rustical, castle feeling. Take less time to construct than ordinary stone tiles and donâ€™t require stone cutting expertise, but lack the beauty of the polished design.

StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.label: temple slabs
StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.description: Large slabs of stone laid at random for that temple-like look. Beautiful to look at.

StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.label: polished stone floor
StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.description: Exquisite, polished stone tiles for an elegant, mansion-like look. They are incredibly beautiful to look at.

StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.label: exquisite tile
StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.description: Exquisite metal tiles, made with no compromises, for expressing economic status. Slow to construct.

StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.label: diagonal tiles
StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.description: A regal floor made of exquisitly polished stone plates, lined with darker cut stone, for expressing economic status. Slow to construct.

StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.label: parquet versailles
StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.description: A regal floor made of intricately cut around precisely-measured wooden tiles, made with no compromises, for expressing economic status. Slow to construct.

StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.label: parquet herringbone
StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.description: A fancy floor made of fine, smoothed, wooden tiles laid in a stylish herringbone pattern.
